samples.question: Tell me, do people in your country enjoy reading?
samples.transcript: No, they are less, they are less read books because we are developing countries and the main force in our labor force is also the worker and they work, you know, they work in the hands-on job so they are not easy for them to take time to read the books. And also the difference, there are a lot of difference between the area and Vietnam because you know a lot of mountain and also the ethnic people, they have their own language. So it is not easy to print the book to teach them in the Vietnamese because that is what we use for the national language. Interesting. Wow. Okay, thank you.

samples.question: Do you think reading is more important for children or for adults?
samples.transcript: Actually, I think reading is important for both children and adults. It depends on what kind of reading for each day of human life. For example, for, you know, I think that one of the biggest benefits that reading brings to humans is that practice them in the ability to focus. And then for the children, you know, we have to practice them to focus, to think and to, to practice. For example, you know, a lot of people talk about the AI development right now and there is some, some of them suggest that we can apply to teach AI for the students. So, I mean that at a small, a small age, they can practice to focus. For the adults, I saw improved that because they are, they are busy with, in working. So, you know, they have also practice reading to improve their knowledge and also to practice, you know, when people have more concentration in something, I think that they can have a good, they can get, they can make good decision. Thank you. Well done.

samples.question: And finally, how has technology changed the way we read?
samples.transcript: Yes. In terms of technology change right now, I think that there is a lot of technological advancement, you know. And we change from the reading of physical book to the electronic book. And I think that is, I, at, on the, on the, I read 100 international publications per day. I think reading physical book, it also, compulsory for some further aspect. And however, you know, we say in the world we talk a lot about the sustainability, sustainable development and you will read a book you have to cut down. You have to spend from the physical to the electronics one So electronics is the more effective way to say to store the book and to have the reading And and sometimes I also bring the paper to read and to make more time to think about it So there is a lot in the pictures. I think that there are huge changes right now. Maybe the future there will be a huge change about the top book or the speaking book. I do not know exactly. Yeah. Wow.

samples.question: So Lam, I want to sit with you now and ask you how do you feel that test went?
samples.transcript: Yeah. Yes, I actually asked you to take several IA exams in the past and I thought that the test has a strong connection with the actual exam. Really? Yeah. And the one thing I, I love that you, if you take a pro IA exam, You know, you are more friendly. You know, I will tell you now, and this is something that many students do not know, the examiners, they have to be quite strict, otherwise they get in trouble. So I am overly friendly to try and encourage students to feel more confident, but in the real test they have to be quite serious. they are very bound by time limits, so they have to follow strict time limits for each of the parts as well. So sometimes they will interrupt you. Yeah, yeah. For example, in your part one, first of all I want to compliment, I loved your sense of humor.

samples.question: Has the way you spend your weekends changed over time?
samples.transcript: Absolutely yes. I have just realized that my hobbies and my activities at the weekend has changed a lot from the beginning. In the past, I used to prefer stay in my house and surfing the internet like other people, other friends. But then I realized that I need my memories, my beloved people more than the information on the internet. So I start to meet my friends and gather with my family. Beautiful, thank you. samples.question: Do you think learning new skills is important in today's world?
samples.transcript: Absolutely, yes. Because you know the world is developing every day and we, if we do not find out the way to improve ourselves, we will, cannot keep up with each other. And imagine that everyone is moving forward quickly and we just working slowly, surfing the internet and do nothing. So I think it is vitally important to improve ourselves by new knowledge in order to survive and grow in today's world. Thank you so much. Wow.

samples.question: What skills are important for young people today?
samples.transcript: I have a lot of idea about this question, but I would like the most important skill for adolescents is time management. Because you know, I found that my friends are really ambitious and they want to handle everything in their life from work, earn money or learn new things, a lot of things. But you know, the problem is they cannot manage their time. So like they use their sleep, sleep time just to earn more money like that.

samples.question: Do you think it is better to learn skills online or with a teacher?
samples.transcript: From my perspective, I think it depends on the people's personality. for example, introvert people, this type of person will keen on learning from home because I think that they will not really enjoy when they meet people outside and talking like this because, they will a little bit shy or something like that. But in contrast extrovert people they will they really would like to speak like this like face to face Like me I want to sit at a table with my teacher like this because I can acquire new knowledge better Thank you I can definitely tell you an extrovert And the final question for today well done Do people in your country prefer to learn practical skills or academic skills? it is an interesting question. I think Vietnamese people are keen on the practical skill Because, you know, we have a lot of jobs in our country like hair, nail dressing or something like that. And, that professions do not need really, much academic knowledge. And so I think that, we will prefer like practice and we will like have more experience from our practice. so that is why I think that we do not need a lot of knowledge in the books. But we cannot deny that the knowledge from books is really useful. And in the future I will keep reading books to have more skill. Thank you, well done. And that brings us to the end of the test. Well done, congratulations. Fantastic. Well done, Khan. Brilliant, amazing.
